## Exercises

### Exercise 1

```{r glimpse-data}
dplyr::glimpse(Teams)
```

The `Teams` dataset has 3015 observations and 48 variables.

### Exercise 2

```{r}
library(magrittr)
mets <- Teams  |> 
  dplyr::filter(teamID == "NYN")
my_mets <- mets |>
  dplyr::filter(yearID %in% 2004:2012)
my_mets %>% 
  dplyr::select(yearID,G,W,L)
```

### Exercise 3

```{r}
mets_ben <- Teams |>
  dplyr::select(yearID, teamID, G, W, L, RA, RS=R) |>
  dplyr::filter(teamID == "NYN" & yearID %in% 2004:2012)
mets_ben
```

### Exercise 4

```{r}
mets_ben <- mets_ben |>
  dplyr::mutate(WPct = 1/1+(RA/RS)^2)
mets_ben

mets_ben <- mets_ben |>
  dplyr::mutate(W_hat = WPct/G)
mets_ben
```

### Exercise 5

```{r}
mets_ben <- mets_ben |>
 dplyr:: mutate(Performance = ifelse(W > W_hat, "Better", "Worse"))
mets_ben
```

### Exercise 6

```{r}
dplyr::arrange(mets_ben, desc(W))
```

### Exercise 7

```{r}
mets_ben <-mets_ben |> 
  dplyr::mutate(Diff = W -W_hat) |>
  dplyr::arrange(desc(Diff))
mets_ben
```

### Exercise 8

```{r}
mets_ben |>
  dplyr::summarize(
    num_years = n(), 
    total_W = sum(W), 
    total_L = sum(L), 
    total_WPct =mean(WPct), 
    sum_resid = sum(Diff)
  )
```

### Exercise 10

```{r}
library(dplyr)
mets_ben <- mets_ben %>%
  dplyr::mutate(
    gm = case_when(
      yearID == 2004 ~ "Jim Duquette",
      yearID >= 2005 & yearID <= 2010 ~ "Omar Minaya",
      yearID >= 2011 ~ "Sandy Alderson"
    )
  )
mets_ben
```

### Exercise 11

```{r}
manager_summary <- mets_ben |>
  group_by(gm) |>
  summarize(
    num_years = n(),
    total_W = sum(W),
    total_L = sum(L),
    total_WPct = mean(WPct),
    sum_resid = sum(Diff)
  )
# Print the manager summary
manager_summary
```
